name: Metaverse Virtual Archery & Archery Augmented Reality
name_original: Metaverse Virtual Archery & Archery Augmented Reality
description: Virtual Archery is an application based on the metaverse, this project is part of the FGA Digitalent Scholarship FGA 2023 Training Program held by the Indonesian Ministry of Communication and Informatics in collaboration with Train4best as a partner.
